rows.label: qst202012_msg001
rows.name:
I want you to retrieve a
pair of golden bracers that
I hid about 30 years ago.

rows.label: qst202012_msg002
rows.name:
I remember burying them
in the Fief of Forgetfulness
in Superbia, but...

rows.label: qst202012_msg003
rows.name:
But Musubi insists that
it was at the Ruins of
Fountain Park in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202012_msg004
rows.name:
Please check both places just
in case. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst202012_msg101
rows.name:
I'd like you to deliver the
bracers to my son and daughter.

rows.label: qst202012_msg102
rows.name:
My son's name is Artus. He should
be in Alba Margen in Superbia.

rows.label: qst202012_msg103
rows.name:
My daughter is called Noelia. She
lives in Fons Maim in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202012_msg104
rows.name:
I trust you to get the bracers to them.
And of course, I'll be sure to reward
you handsomely when you're done!
